meanings.definition: to treat rubber with sulfur to improve its strength and elasticity.
meanings.sent1: The factory vulcanizes the rubber to make it more durable.
meanings.sent2: She vulcanizes the rubber soles of shoes to make them last longer.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey vulcanizes the rubber band, making it stretchier than ever!
meanings.sent4: His determination vulcanizes his resolve, making him stronger in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The magical potion vulcanizes the rubber, giving it extraordinary powers of flexibility.
